lyrics:
15 contributorsfriends lovers or nothing lyricsverse 1
now that we are over as the loving kind

friends lovers or nothing
there can only be one

you whisper come on over
cause youre two drinks in

think well never fall into the jealous game
the streets are flood with blood of those who felt the same

chorus
friends lovers or nothing
there can only be one
friends lovers or nothing
there will never be an inbetween so give it up

chorus

we can really only ever be one

well never be the inbetween
so give it up

so give it up
